examples: The slow train arrived at the station behind schedule.
Has the train from Bristol arrived?
The fast train arrived at the destination in no time.
Replies to the advertisement are arriving in fits and starts.
The elevator arrived after a couple of minutes of waiting.
words.defineEn: to reach a location, particularly as an end to a journey
words.defineVi: để đạt được một địa điểm, đặc biệt là kết thúc một cuộc hành trình

examples: The shopkeeper closed the shop for a short break.
The police closed in.
The business has already closed the books for this quarter.
Detectives had closed the book on the Hornsey Murders case three years previously.
The library closes early on Sundays.
words.defineEn: to move something like a window or door into a position that people or things cannot pass through
words.defineVi: để di chuyển một cái gì đó như cửa sổ hoặc cửa ra vào một vị trí mà mọi người hoặc những thứ không thể đi qua

examples: His family comes first.
Knowledge of cooking comes easy to him.
Come rain or shine.
After dinner comes the reckoning.
All good things come to an end.
words.defineEn: to move or travel toward something or someone
words.defineVi: để di chuyển hoặc đi về phía một cái gì đó hoặc một ai đó

examples: That guy really hates my guts.
I hate shopping.
Everybody hates the sight of you.
I hate summer vacation.
Before all this, I just hated the sight of him.
words.defineEn: to really not like something or someone
words.defineVi: để thực sự không thích một cái gì đó hoặc một ai đó

examples: The squash player killed the ball with a nick.
The sauce would kill the taste of the herbs.
Too much garlic killed the taste of the meat.
Cancer kills thousands of people every year.
The outstanding finale killed the audience.
words.defineEn: to end the life of someone or something
words.defineVi: để kết thúc cuộc sống của một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

examples: The farm sits in the shadow of Ben Nevis.
Candidates will sit the examinations in June.
She sits her horse gracefully.
A large bus was sitting outside.
The new policy sits well with the company's values.
words.defineEn: to be in or on a chair or seat, or on the ground, resting our weight on our bottom with a straight back
words.defineVi: ở trong hoặc trên ghế hoặc ghế ngồi, hoặc trên mặt đất, dồn trọng lượng của chúng ta xuống mông với lưng thẳng

examples: Sleep well and sweet dreams.
I slept like a log until morning.
I usually sleep like a baby.
I didn't sleep a wink last night.
I usually sleep for eight hours every night.
words.defineEn: to rest our mind and body, with our eyes closed
words.defineVi: để tâm trí và cơ thể của chúng ta nghỉ ngơi, với đôi mắt nhắm lại

examples: His frame spoke tiredness.
He spoke the final words of the play.
The brochure speaks of beautiful secluded grounds.
My mother spoke Russian.
Please speak more slowly.
words.defineEn: to use one's voice to express a particular feeling or to communicate information
words.defineVi: sử dụng giọng nói của một người để thể hiện một cảm giác cụ thể hoặc để truyền đạt thông tin
